short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replicates the current tab 1 to 10 times

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension transcends the tab duplication process of Google Chrome to the level of tab replication.

Chrome users will be able to click on the icon of this extension, then choose from the popup the number of times, between 1 to 10, they want to replicate the current tab.
